long_description: The super soft Wander dog bed from Kurgo offers a comfortable home away from home for your 4-legged travel companion. Waterproof Rufftex(TM) bottom features a blend of rubber and corduroy to keep it from slipping around in the car; plush fleece top supplies luxurious comfort for your pup. Dog bed rolls up in seconds; built-in handle makes toting it a cinch. Hidden pocket offers a spot to stash something that smells like home. Kurgo Wander dog bed is machine washable for easy cleaning. Medium size is designed for dogs under 40 lbs.; large size designed for dogs over 40 lbs.
short_description: The super soft Wander dog bed from Kurgo offers a comfortable home away from home for your 4-legged travel companion.
